name: Garner
description:
Robin is on an adventure to find the treasure of his ancestral Zucchini Kingdom, he has to escape a path full of scary ghosts trying to kill anyone who is in search of the lost treasure, and now he has to run for his life to escape those Evil ghosts while grabbing all the coins and finding the treasure! Can you help him get through this alive and win the treasure? Here's how to play...

•Tap vertical arrow to move up

•Tap right arrow to move ahead

•Tap left arrow to move back

 Collect all the coins and escape !!

 Features

# Easy controls!

# Beautiful graphics!

# Addictive gameplay!

# Excellent time killer game!
